game.name: Smipat and the Lost Bones
game.shortDescription: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.
game.shortDescriptionEn: In Smipat and the Lost Bones you follow the life of Smipat, a necromancer's pet with a will of it's own. Smipat has lost some of it's bones and is going on an adventure to find them. Each bone has it's own unique ability that makes it possible to overcome the challenges ahead.
